weka.knowledgeflow.steps

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.BaseStep
      • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, BaseStepExtender, Step

    @KFStep(name="Block",
        category="Flow",
        toolTipText="Block until a specific step has finished procesing",
        iconPath="weka/gui/knowledgeflow/icons/DiamondPlain.gif")
public class Block
extends BaseStep
    A step that waits for a specified step to finish processing before allowing incoming data to proceed downstream.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
